intro: Annickia chlorantha, commonly known as the green annickia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves that are usually oval to elliptic in shape. It produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. The plant is often grown as an ornamental due to its attractive foliage and delicate blooms.
